title: Trump tells Puerto Ricans to "have a good time"
description:
(3 Oct 2017) US President Donald Trump and his wife Melania toured storm-damaged Puerto Rico on Tuesday. 
The Trumps made the visit to review the US island's recovery from Hurricane Maria, which blew ashore on September 20. 
Trump met a family whose neighbourhood and home were damaged by the hurricane and told them "We're going to help you out. Have a good time."
Trump's visit came after what critics have said was a slow response to the crisis on the island. At least 16 people have died from the hurricane.


You can license this story through AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/metadata/youtube/c97bd9ead4d5db0a63306a5d05c5ebe6 
Find out more about AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/HowWeWork
